ResearchProjectDef.label: Tribal Alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: In an alchemy experiment make by shaman created some strange mixtures, which make fire dancing when it lit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Witchery of Thunderer
ResearchProjectDef.description: We used to only regarded it as a gift from the god, but now we have revealed the mystery of this witchcraft.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Blackpowder
ResearchProjectDef.description: After countless explorations of the formula ratio, we firmly believe that we have mastered the material formula ratio of so-called "gunpowder" by outsiders and can manufacture it in large quantities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Arquebus
ResearchProjectDef.description: The aiming and recoil problem of hand cannon has always been difficult for us to solve, until we discover that there are similar weaponry in the history of Outlanders,it maybe worth for our research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Match Lock
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using the ignited match string as the heat source to ignite gunpowder, so that we no longer need to rely on the fire source to heat the iron as the ignition material.but it may malfunctioning in rainy day.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flint Lock
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use flint friction to ignite gunpowder, so even some Drizzle will not affect our use of musket.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wheel Lock
ResearchProjectDef.description: A complicated mechanism designed to ensure that musket can be fired in any weather conditions, but it will be a long and complicated time to make this thing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: High Caliber
ResearchProjectDef.description: In order to penetrate Mechanoid, we tried to scale the musket until it was enough to penetrate anything in front of it, which we call "A justice from caliber."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ancient Weapon from Outlanders
ResearchProjectDef.description: Inquiring into the history of Outlanders, we finally got two ancient imitation Musket and Blueprints from a strange merchant. now we can imitate similar things from them.
